question:
At a convention of monsters,  \(\frac{2}{5}\) have no horns,  \(\frac{1}{7}\) have one horn, \(\frac{1}{3}\) have two horns, and the remaining 26 have three or more horns. How many monsters are attending the convention?
(A) 100
(B) 130
(C) 180
(D) 210
(E) 260
Show
Hide
